thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses Canada Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses Canada | smartbuyglasses.ca
thread.title: Alain Desautels
thread.title_full: SmartBuyGlasses Canada reviewed by Alain Desautels

author: Alain Desautels
title: Alain Desautels
text: Great price, good quality, but the lead time could be better... especially when the selected frame is supposed to by quick ship and still takes a week just to get to the opticians for the prescription after the optician process took about 3 days. Took a total 16 days to get to me.
